attributes.action: gordon i as a englishman am calling for a vote of no confidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want a vote of no confidence in the current goverment if you wish to join my petition then please do , I for one dont trust any of you but your ignorance in denying  the people of there human rights to vote what is the differance then , when we are at war in other countrys giving them democracy when you mr brown are denying us democracy that is the bottom line 




one very fed up mikey fry
